attributes.action: Call an election as soon as the new Prime Minister is appointed by the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is a democratic nation -- it is wrong in the 21st century that any political party can usurp the rights of the people by changing the Prime Minister without the consent of the electorate.  We urge the new Prime Minister to legitimise his position and seek a mandate to govern from the people by calling an election immediately he is appointed by the Queen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
